name: Rubber Duck Rumble
description:
ENTER THE ARENA!
Do you have what it takes to survive and become the victor in RUBBER DUCK RUMBLE.

WHAT'S THIS!?

Rubber Duck Rumble is an acrade-like 3rd Person shooter game, where you take control of a Rubber Duck and take aim with the cannons strapped to it to eliminate all of your opponents.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS!

Plug in extra controllers and have your friends join you in the arena with 2 and 4 player split screen available to play.

PLAY YOUR WAY.

You get to decide how your games will play, with a variety of settings available to choose from, you can choose to play how you want.

*Requirements:*
Please note, this game requires the use of a Gamepad/Controller in order to be played. It also requires the use of the Mouse to navigate menus.

More Planned!

The latest build, available for download, currently features Solo, Duo and Squad gameplay and has a basic form of AI for enemies. This game has been produced as part of an assessed piece of content for a University Degree and as such, due to time constraints this is all that can be done for now. HOWEVER there are still plans for further development on the game with extra time, including a revamp of the AI, additional game modes (Capture the Flag, Domination, 'Duck-Duck-Goose') and more content relating to player customisation. So stay tuned for more updates!

Got feedback for the Dev? Feel free to contact me via Twitter @Katacaz.
